user_input: What is the meaning of life?
quotehammer:
"WAAAGH! Life be fightin'! Waaagh mean dat life ain't 'bout findin' out what's da point, eet ees 'bout takin' chances, crushin' enemy skulls, and havin' da best fight in da universe! Da meaning of life be conquest, boyz! Conquest of every last enemy dat gets in da way of da Great Waaagh!"

(winks, cracks a bloody smile)
